CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 3, 1957, pg. A2, reads: "At Work - With his immediate supervisor, A. R. Ferrucci, power engineer at the city's Department of Water, Joseph Weaver is designing an elevated water tank which will be the city's first. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Engineer Joseph Weaver seated behind drafting table with plans for water tower, with A. R. Ferrucci beside him, in office at water department of city of Pittsburgh
